SEARCH
Package de.annalisa.loveletters.commands

Interface Command

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExitCommand, HelpCommand, PlayCardCommand, RulesCommand, ShowHandCommand, ShowPlayersCommand, ShowScoreCommand, StartCommand
public interface Command
The `Command` interface defines the structure for implementing different game commands in the Love Letter game. It provides methods to retrieve information about the command and execute it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    execute(Game game, boolean inGame)
    Executes the command based on the fact, if the player is currently playing a game or not.
    String
    getCommand()
    Retrieves the command name or keyword.
    String
    getDescription()
    Retrieves a brief description of what the command does.
    String[]
    getUsages()
    Retrieves an array of usage descriptions for the command.

  • Method Details

    • getCommand

      String getCommand()
      Retrieves the command name or keyword.
      Returns:
      The name or keyword of the command.

    • getUsages

      String[] getUsages()
      Retrieves an array of usage descriptions for the command.
      Returns:
      An array of usage descriptions for the command, each describing how the command can be used.

    • getDescription

      String getDescription()
      Retrieves a brief description of what the command does.
      Returns:
      A brief description of the command's functionality.

    • execute

      boolean execute(Game game, boolean inGame) throws ExitGameException
      Executes the command based on the fact, if the player is currently playing a game or not.
      Parameters:
      game - The current game instance where the command will be executed.
      inGame - A boolean indicating whether the command is executed during a game session.
      Returns:
      false if the command execution was successful and thus the input loop should stop asking for input, true otherwise.
      Throws:
      ExitGameException - to indicate that the Love Letter game should exit or terminate. This exception is used to control the flow of the game and allow players to choose whether to play again or exit the game.
